MODCOMMENTS_COMMAND_ADDMOD_DESC: Links a mod in 5mods to receive comments in this channel.
MODCOMMENTS_COMMAND_ADDMOD_INVALID: The URL does not appears to be valid, please check the link and try again.
MODCOMMENTS_COMMAND_ADDMOD_EXISTS: This mod is already registered to <#{0}> in the server.
MODCOMMENTS_COMMAND_LISTMODS_DESC: Lists all of the mods from 5mods registered in this server.
MODCOMMENTS_COMMAND_LISTMODS_NONE: There are no mods registered in this server.
MODCOMMENTS_COMMAND_DELETEMOD_DONE: The mod has been successfully removed.
